name: There's No Shadow Without Light
description:
If you really believe in something it can become a reality. This way even your shattered psyche can help you to escape the Asylum. Light and dark sides of you can work together and help each other. An incorporeal shadow hides in the dark and a shining deity floats in the light. Use them as a means to escape. Just don't get caught.

Disclaimer: The game was made for Global Game Jam - 2022, theme: "duality"

Default controls:

  • Movement - WASD or Mouse Left Button
  • Aim - Hold Right Mouse Button
  • Fire - Release Right Mouse Button
  • Transform between Light and Shadow forms - Space
  • Release Object - E
  • Controls can be remapped in the game.
  • Turn on the "Use Navigation" option to move with one click, just pointing to the destination.

Abilities:

Angel can interact with objects and levitate over the abyss along with lights.

Shadow is invisible in the dark and can seep through some objects like a grate, for example.

Using projectiles, Angel can switch lights and Shadow can teleport.

To pass the level you will need to combine the abilities of both.
